docs.abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column contends main positive effect of vote recount led by Green Party candidate Jill Stein in Michigan and elsewhere is that it may remind voters Donald Trump is one of least successful presidential candidates in American history; notes Trump lost popular vote by over two million votes, record bested only by Rutherford B Hayes.
